alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 2:25PM CDT until May 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Flood Warning for... Central Okmulgee County in northeastern Oklahoma... Okfuskee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT Saturday. * At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rains are gradually coming to an end across the warned area. However, radar estimates between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen today from persistent, training thunderstorms. This heavy rainfall is likely resulting in some flooding, especially in low lying areas, creeks and streams. * Some locations that may experience flooding include... Okmulgee... Okemah... Okfuskee... Beggs... Boley... Paden... Bearden... Castle... Preston... Bald Hill... Okmulgee State Park... Liberty... Mason... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 212 and 226.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
